str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Apparently a primary verb; which uses dremo drem'-o as alternate in certain tenses; to run or walk hastily.
Together, at the same place and time. Genitive case of homos as adverb; at the same place or time.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.
A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To run before, outrun, run in advance. From pro and trecho; to run forward, i.e. Outstrip, precede.
Peter, a Greek name meaning rock. Apparently a primary word; a rock; as a name, Petrus, an apostle.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A tomb, sepulcher, monument. From mneme; a remembrance, i.e. Cenotaph.
First, before, principal, most important. Contracted superlative of pro; foremost.
